command.name: Capture
command.description: Create and share beautiful images of your source code.

code.name: Code
code.description: The source code to appear in the image.

file.name: File
file.description: Upload a file with which its contents will appear in the image.
file.large: The file you uploaded was too large, please try again with a smaller file.

backup: Preferred service timed out, using backup service.
down: Both services are down, please try again later.
